statements: SELECT * FROM financial_dashboard;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM financial_dashboard;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM financial_dashboard ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM financial_dashboard WHERE account_balance >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_dashboard WHERE last_updated >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance, last_updated FROM financial_dashboard WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM financial_dashboard WHERE account_balance < 5000 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM financial_dashboard ORDER BY account_balance DESC, account_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_dashboard WHERE account_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY account_id;
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM financial_dashboard WHERE last_updated < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY account_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' OR account_type = 'Checking' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_name, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM accounts JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id GROUP BY account_name ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT account_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM accounts LEFT JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id GROUP BY account_name HAVING num_transactions > 5;

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, accounts.account_name, transactions.amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM transactions JOIN accounts ON transactions.account_id = accounts.account_id ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING SUM(transaction_amount) > 500;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'user%' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT account_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY account_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_balances;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Withdrawal' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC, account_name ASC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_name, transaction_type, amount FROM account_balances JOIN transactions ON account_balances.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT u.username, t.transaction_date, t.amount FROM users u JOIN user_transactions ut ON u.user_id = ut.user_id JOIN transactions t ON ut.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.amount >= 500;
SELECT u.username, SUM(ut.amount) AS total_amount FROM users u JOIN user_transactions ut ON u.user_id = ut.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_amount > 2000;
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance >= 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(customer_name) < 10 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, a.account_name FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE t.amount > 500 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT a.account_name, ah.balance, t.type_name FROM accounts a JOIN accounts_history ah ON a.account_id = ah.account_id JOIN transaction_types t ON ah.transaction_id = t.type_id WHERE ah.balance < 0 ORDER BY a.account_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT c.customer_name, t.amount, a.account_name FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.account_id JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE c.email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
